biotools.summary: Deep learning with Graphical clustering for CyTOF (DGCyTOF), is a tool used to identify cell populations. The method novelty is to distinguish the calibration cell population and the new cell population by a sequential four steps with an iteration calibration system.

bioschemas.name: DGCyTOF
